meta_title: TPM Definition: Maximizing OEE with AI-Driven Maintenance
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor maintenance execution. This definitive TPM definition provides the framework for zero-loss manufacturing in 2026.
title: TPM Definition: The Definitive Guide to Total Productive Maintenance in the Era of Industry 5.0

hero_image.alt: Hero image for TPM Definition: The Definitive Guide to Total Productive Maintenance in the Era of Industry 5.0

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic shot of a modern manufacturing floor. A diverse group of three maintenance professionals—two men and one woman—are standing near a large industrial pump system. They are wearing clean white hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One person is holding a ruggedized tablet, showing only the back of the device. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the clean, well-maintained machinery. The background shows a blur of a highly organized production line, conveying a sense of efficiency and "Total Productive Maintenance." No text or logos are visible in the image.
